EmailTemplate.description: [7.8.2019 HG] Notification for Positive Customer Feedback
EmailTemplate.name: Kudos v2
EmailTemplate.subject: You are amazing! Your customer submitted feedback
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for helping {!Pivotal_Survey_Feedback__c.ContactName_Feedback__c} from {!Pivotal_Survey_Feedback__c.Account_Name_Feedback__c} with their issue, "{!Pivotal_Survey_Feedback__c.CaseSubject_Feedback__c}" (case number: {!Pivotal_Survey_Feedback__c.CaseURL_Feedback__c})
They gave you a {!Pivotal_Survey_Feedback__c.CES_Survey_Score__c} out of 5. Customer comments (if any): {!Pivotal_Survey_Feedback__c.CES_Positive_Feedback__c}
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Nice work, {!Pivotal_Survey_Feedback__c.Case_Owner_Feedback__c}!
- Your Support Enablement team
